verses.verse: Come <S%H7126>near<s%>, you <S%H1471>nations<s%>, to <S%H8085>hear<s%>; and <S%H7181>listen<s%>, you <S%H3816>people<s%>: let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and all that is in <S%H4393>it<s%>; the <S%H8398>world<s%>, and all things that come forth of <S%H6631>it<s%>.

For the <S%H7110>indignation<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is upon all <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and his <S%H2534>fury<s%> upon all their <S%H6635>armies<s%>: he has utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H5414>them<s%>, he has delivered them to the <S%H2874>slaughter<s%>.

Their <S%H2491>slain<s%> also shall be cast <S%H7993>out<s%>, and their <S%H889>stink<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of their <S%H6297>carcasses<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>melted<s%> with their <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And all the <S%H6635>army<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> shall be <S%H4743>dissolved<s%>, and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall be rolled <S%H1556>together<s%> as a <S%H5612>scroll<s%>: and all their <S%H6635>army<s%> shall fall <S%H5034>down<s%>, as the <S%H5929>leaf<s%> falls <S%H5034>off<s%> from the <S%H1612>vine<s%>, and as a <S%H5034>falling<s%> fig from the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%>.

For my <S%H2719>sword<s%> shall be <S%H7301>bathed<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: <S%H3381>behold<s%>, it shall come down upon <S%H123>Edom<s%>, and upon the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H2764>curse<s%>, to <S%H4941>judgment<s%>.

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, it is made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H2459>fatness<s%>, and with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%> and <S%H6260>goats<s%>, with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%>, and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>.

And the <S%H7214>unicorns<s%> shall come <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6499>them<s%>, and the bullocks with the <S%H47>bulls<s%>; and their <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H7301>soaked<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and their <S%H6083>dust<s%> made <S%H1878>fat<s%> with <S%H2459>fatness<s%>.
For it is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>, and the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7966>recompences<s%> for the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.

And the <S%H5158>streams<s%> there shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2203>pitch<s%>, and the <S%H6083>dust<s%> there into <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> there shall become <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H2203>pitch<s%>.

It shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> nor <S%H3119>day<s%>; the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> there shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> it shall lie <S%H2717>waste<s%>; none shall pass <S%H5674>through<s%> it for <S%H5331>ever<s%> and <S%H5331>ever<s%>.

But the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7090>bittern<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3244>it<s%>; the owl also and the <S%H6158>raven<s%> shall <S%H7931>live<s%> in <S%H5186>it<s%>: and he shall stretch out upon it the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion<s%>, and the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H922>emptiness<s%>.
They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles<s%> there to the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%>, but none shall be <S%H8269>there<s%>, and all her princes shall be <S%H657>nothing<s%>.

And <S%H5518>thorns<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> in her <S%H759>palaces<s%>, <S%H7057>nettles<s%> and <S%H2336>brambles<s%> in the <S%H4013>fortresses<s%> <S%H5116>there<s%>: and it shall be a habitation of <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and a <S%H2681>court<s%> for <S%H1323>owls<s%>.

The wild animals of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> shall also <S%H6298>meet<s%> with the wild animals of the <S%H338>island<s%>, and the <S%H8163>satyr<s%> shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow<s%>; the screech <S%H3917>owl<s%> also shall <S%H7280>rest<s%> <S%H4672>there<s%>, and find for herself a place of <S%H4494>rest<s%>.

There shall the great <S%H7091>owl<s%> make her <S%H7077>nest<s%>, and <S%H4422>lay<s%>, and <S%H1234>hatch<s%>, and <S%H1716>gather<s%> under her <S%H6738>shadow<s%>: there shall the <S%H1772>vultures<s%> also be <S%H6908>gathered<s%>, every <S%H802>one<s%> with her <S%H7468>mate<s%>.

Seek you <S%H1875>out<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7121>read<s%>: no <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>these<s%> shall <S%H5737>fail<s%>, <S%H802>none<s%> shall <S%H6485>want<s%> her <S%H7468>mate<s%>: for my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> it has <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, and his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> it has gathered <S%H6908>them<s%>.

And he has <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for <S%H3027>them<s%>, and his hand has <S%H2505>divided<s%> it unto them by <S%H6957>line<s%>: they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> shall they live in <S%H7931>it<s%>.
